website_summaries.verdict: Good mix of guidance for first-time ACT test takers as well as those looking for a higher score.
pros: After purchasing book, you'll receive plenty of online info and tests so you can study anywhere
Kaplan guarantees score improvement or you'll receive a refund
Does exactly what it promises in terms of test prep
cons: Some questions are too easy in the booklet versus what you'd encounter on actual exam

customer_reviews.title: Helped our daughter improve her score 5 points.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter, who after taking an ACT Prep class as well as the test twice, was unhappy with her score. With the help of this book she was able to increase her score by 5 points to where she is now happy with it. We combined this book withto help her focus on her weaker part. Not only did those improve, but the sections she had done well on, she made improvements as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin and Carrie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: This book has not evolved with the times
customer_reviews.text: The teaching sections of this course are still good, but the full length tests are not realistic in terms of difficulty (they are much easier than the real ACT), and there are still a good number of errors in the book that should be corrected. (I have tried to contact Kaplan to tell them of the errors but no one ever gets back to me.) The sections on the new writing section are good. Again, for the first half of the book this is a good buy. But the tests are not the best for preparing students for the real ACT.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher P

customer_reviews.title: Only one test in the book.
customer_reviews.text: Says 5 practice tests but there’s only one in the book. The rest are online. The test is paper based and many prefer to practice on paper. Might not be a breaking point for some but I know it is for many. The book itself has a decent amount of practice material but a lot of it is just fluff and filler.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Improved 4 points!
customer_reviews.text: This is a large book with LOTS of information. The test taking tips and practice questions are helpful. The book has many sections, so you can review information that you need to brush up on and skip others. Helped my son’s score go up 4 points.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kimbell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that would make this better if it would hypnotise your kid into actually utilizing it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mcmillan

customer_reviews.title: Plus 6
customer_reviews.text: My son received a 26 the first time he took the ACT. He wanted better so we bought 4 different prep books. He said, without a doubt, this one was the best. I can't say it was all due to this book but he got a 32 the second time he took the test. Make sure you get the current addition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate description
customer_reviews.text: FYI-the book says "5 practice tests" on the front. There are not 5 practice tests in this booklet. There is a link to complete practice tests through Kaptest online. There is 1 complete practice test in the back of the book. All the other practice is linked to explanations of each type of question on the ACT. Which is great is that is what you need. If you just need to practice getting through 60 questions in 60 minutes, then all that has to be done online. Once we got it set up, then I guess it was fine. It was frustrating to receive an 800 page book that only had 1 complete test!
customer_reviews.author: S. L.

customer_reviews.title: Was good help but son felt it needed to be more ...
customer_reviews.text: Was good help but son felt it needed to be more comprehensive with better sample tests and tips on understanding how the test is structured.
customer_reviews.author: H S Rivney

customer_reviews.title: Buy ACT book early! Good Book
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two copies of this book for my sons. Do not wait for the American public school system to educate your children. Students should be studying this book two years before their high school graduation. Important for students to learn their weaknesses. ACT and SAT scores play an important role in receiving scholarships and acceptance. If you child is an athlete, ACT and SAT scores are still important. Also buy other books that will aid your child in learning.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Williams

customer_reviews.title: Online stuff not easy to get to
customer_reviews.text: I just tried to register my book and it says I have to answer the following question to unlock the key - What is the last word in the last question (question 25) at the end of chapter 14? The funny thing is there ISN'T A CHAPTER 14. Plan to call customer service during the weekday but seriously disappointed in this. Also irritated that the book says FIVE tests and there is only ONE in the book and the rest are online - which I can't get to
customer_reviews.author: John Millard

customer_reviews.title: About time!
customer_reviews.text: An ACT book from Kaplan with ACT exercises?? It’s about time! This is an excellent resource, and it has stepped up my tutoring several levels. Many many thanks!
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Not a good book to start with!
customer_reviews.text: I was of the impression that this book has 5 practice test as hard copy, to my disappointment, it has only one practice test in the book. what a waste of money! Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Swestvirginia

customer_reviews.title: Not good for studying the ACT
customer_reviews.text: This book is a bad preparation book for the ACT, and it's unfortunate that I realized this on the day of the test. All the practice tests are easier than the actual test and there aren't enough strategies.
customer_reviews.author: Son Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Wrong test answers provided
customer_reviews.text: My daughter took the practice test in the back. I entered her answers into the website to have it scored (which you get access to when you purchase the book). When she reviewed the problems she missed some in the reading section were completely different problems than what was on the test. So, we don’t have an accurate result. This is a serious error. She hasn’t yet reviewed the problems on the science portion. She plans to take some of the online practice tests that you get access to, but I fear that we might run into the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great book for high school juniors and seniors
customer_reviews.text: This book has been great for my senior to work through. I know this might not happen for everyone but his scores have improved since he started this book. Needles to say, we are thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Nilson

customer_reviews.title: Great re-teaching book
customer_reviews.text: My 47 year. Old room mate signed up for his GD! I was so exited. I grabbed this for him he enjoys being able to test himself . This book has been a great tool to ready yourself for the GED. Maybe boost your confidence a little also..
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Not similar to real ACT tests & only 1 test in the book
customer_reviews.text: The questions on these tests are not similar to real ACT tests - the questions are much more subjective and do not match the way questions on the actual ACT test are structured. This book also repeats tests from their other books, so don't get more than one book from them. Also, four of the five tests are online, not in the book, so you have to print them out.
customer_reviews.author: Eustache

customer_reviews.title: study guide is useful
customer_reviews.text: You get out what you put in...If you use the book and spend the time to do all the problems, I think the repetition is very helpful to prepare for the test. It's a great guide and I love Kaplan products.
customer_reviews.author: Michele L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful. My daughter used this and truly made a huge impact in her scores
customer_reviews.author: Ana S.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Got this quick. Now the success of this material is dependent on my child's ability to comprehend the material and score high on the test. That will be determined later.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good paper for making paper airplanes, jk it is very helpful with plenty of example/practice tests/problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent program to assist in getting a good score on ACT.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: ACT PREP 2019
customer_reviews.text: ACT PREP 2019 is a great choice! I tutor just noirs and seniors, so I bought a if these manuals for my college bound students. Their results were amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B. Whittleton

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth The Money!
customer_reviews.text: This book has been very helpful with preparing my daughter for the ACT test. She didn't do so well the first time (before the book) and she just recently took the test again and said that she felt it went much better and that the book definitely helped tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good study tool
customer_reviews.text: With the help of this book my son improved his score by 4 points.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal A.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful book
customer_reviews.text: This book prepared me really well for the ACT, I studied on my own and got a great score. I found the online resources particularly helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Lunardelli

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, study through other means.
customer_reviews.text: It didnt help me and now I have a giant book sitting around my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: What a total ripoff
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I could not be more disappointed with my Kaplan book, which promised 5 practice tests, only gives one in the book, and when I try to access them online and create an account, they are nowhere to be found. REALLY UNIMPRESSED. Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My score went up 4 points
customer_reviews.text: I used only the Kaplan Book and online resources to prepare for the ACT and my score went up 4 points. The book does an excellent job breaking down the tests and concepts and the online resources have amazing practice tests and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it today. Even though I thought this was coming with a CD for my laptop I am still happy with this purchase. I think it will help me study for the ACT
customer_reviews.author: Erin P.

customer_reviews.title: Get to 36, score big
customer_reviews.text: Studying is important and this book is great to assist all levels of test takers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it - now to get her to use it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Long

customer_reviews.title: I did not really read it
customer_reviews.text: and you probably won’t either, but it is definitely the book advertised here
customer_reviews.author: Justin Mumma

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed this course
customer_reviews.text: I learned a lot. I completed all the lessons that is what is more important just taking the time to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Williams

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: After getting this book and studying I gained two points.. not as much as I wanted but still good it’s a good start.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Test prep best
customer_reviews.text: Great book love how it explains test helps and has practice tests included but also explains how to get the answer
customer_reviews.author: Tina Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Missing Chapters
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two copies and they are missing a good section (50 pages) of the ACT Reading material from Chapter 15 and Chapter 16.
customer_reviews.author: DLM

customer_reviews.title: There are no 5 tests, only one!
customer_reviews.text: There is only ONE real test in this book! Not 5 like they write in the description! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay Pitirimov

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product I just didn’t seems to learn great from it
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Item defective
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using this book for ACT prep and just got to an entire section that is missing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer  F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very useful information and the test prep is very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great guide to pass ACT
customer_reviews.text: Great book to have to study for ACT. Very informational.
customer_reviews.author: Laure Gauntner

customer_reviews.title: Came Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Sucks when it comes in the box this way, brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and it was a huge help for her testing
customer_reviews.author: Teja

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far the book has been a God sent :)
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my child. It helped a lot
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Kaplan support is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: The book itself is a wonderful tool through which I can help 3 seniors who under my guidance are attempting to raise their scores. But because I don't have parent email, I am not able to access any of the online materials. I have called the phone number provided and it never connects. I have sent emails which have been returned undeliverable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ehretsman

customer_reviews.title: loved this, it helped me so much when taking ...
customer_reviews.text: loved this, it helped me so much when taking the act's.good tests and advice. Without it not sure what I would have done
customer_reviews.author: Olivia001

customer_reviews.title: 2018 ACT Prep Plus prep Book
customer_reviews.text: Everything We we expected. We just sent it back because We were able to barrow one from a Cousin. But it was a Great book, the on e we used was last year's addition but got a perfect score on the test!! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: T. J. L.

customer_reviews.title: SAT & ACT for College
customer_reviews.text: I bought this SAT & the Kaplan ACT books for my grandson who is graduating next year & needed a study guide for these two separate test. We are not sure what college he'll be attending we thought best to buy both study guides. What I did like upon reviewing each of the guides is comprehensive study for subjects that he would be tested on. Additionally, that there is also online tutorial & tutoring if needed. I am sure that tutoring is a additional price. But, overall I think that the book could assist my grandson in scoring high on either test
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Walker

customer_reviews.title: ... not the newspaper material but it wo uld be better if they were white
customer_reviews.text: It explains well but wish the pages were not the newspaper material but it wo uld be better if they were white .
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: ... questions are not too hard but there's still a good variety of exercises
customer_reviews.text: the questions are not too hard but there's still a good variety of exercises. it's an ideal book for whoever wants to improve their act score by a few points. there's also a practice test in the end and more study material on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Alara

customer_reviews.title: It helped
customer_reviews.text: He made a 26 so I think this book helped
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Book has more info than I anticipated. Bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: Book has more info than I anticipated. Bought it for my sister to help her get a higher score. We'll see what happens!
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Only One Printed Test
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the test to include five PRINTED practice tests to simulate the actual testing experience. The book only had one complete test and answer sheet. My grandson has access to numerous online tests but that is not how he will take the test. However, I think the training is useful in general.
customer_reviews.author: Conspicuous ConsumerTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: In this world the ACT is very crucial for their future and it is very important to prepare for this test so you can get the best score possible and this book does the job
customer_reviews.text: This book holds valuable information that my daughter needed to know. In this world the ACT is very crucial for their future and it is very important to prepare for this test so you can get the best score possible and this book does the job. The ACT Prep Plus book shows you a bunch of practice tests and exercises that you can complete and you can even check your answers. The great thing about this book is that if you get an answer wrong, you can look up the explanation in the book so you can better understand your mistakes to avoid them on the actual test.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Uehara

customer_reviews.title: GREAT REVIEW RESOURCE!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent resource! This book tells you strategies for how to analyze and answer the questions!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Daniel Fairchild Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great test taking tips and practice tests! We will see if it helped.
customer_reviews.author: donna slayton

product_meta.title: ACT Prep Plus 2019: 5 Practice Tests + Proven Strategies + Online (Kaplan Test Prep)
